meanings.definition: The sound made to represent snoring or sleeping.
meanings.sent1: I heard loud zzz coming from the bedroom last night.
meanings.sent2: After a long day, all I wanted to do was fall asleep and hear some zzz.
meanings.sent3: The cat's gentle zzz sounds were oddly soothing.
meanings.sent4: The peaceful night was filled with the comforting zzz of everyone sleeping.
meanings.sent5: The baby's adorable zzz noises made everyone smile.

meanings.definition: A symbol used to represent sleeping or snoring in written communication.
meanings.sent1: In the chat, she added some zzz to show she was going to bed.
meanings.sent2: The comic book character had little zzz above his head to indicate he was sleeping.
meanings.sent3: The email ended with a funny zzz to show the sender was tired.
meanings.sent4: The book used zzz to illustrate the character's deep slumber.
meanings.sent5: The text message had a cute emoji with zzz to convey the sender's need for rest.
